LanguageData.Anon2OrnatePlantPot.label: ornate plant pot
LanguageData.Anon2OrnatePlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby. This plant pot has some artwork carved into it.
LanguageData.Anon2OrnateSquarePlantPot.label: ornate square plant pot
LanguageData.Anon2OrnateSquarePlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby. This plant pot has some artwork carved into it.
LanguageData.Anon2PlantSpot.label: plant spot
LanguageData.Anon2PlantSpot.description: A large flat pot for decorative flowers. Easier to build but not quite as pretty as a pot.
LanguageData.Anon2SquarePlantPot.label: square plant pot
LanguageData.Anon2SquarePlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
